name: The 2nd Edition GLOBAL FORUM ON VACCINES & VACCINATION
content: The main objective of this conference is to bring all the eminent people of Vaccines research together to share their ideas. The program will provide an extensive overview of latest breakthroughs and technologies in vaccines research. All the sessions are drafted to focus the recent trends in new vaccines development. The speakers from various labs and research institutions of the world will share their experience through an interactive platform of VAC-2020.
